title: BlackBerry says surgery was needed to bring Android up to its secure standards
text:
BlackBerry says surgery was needed to bring Android up to its secure standards 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
BlackBerry's next phone is a slider called the Priv, and it's going to run Android. The confirmation comes after a stream of rumors, and the...
